basic_information.committee_name: COB - College of Business Scholarship Committee

description: To provide a scholarship to a UCO student who meets the following requirements: Eligibility Requirements Pursuing a degree in the College of Business Minimum 3.0 GPA Provide a personal statement of 1 page showing leadership and community service

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"

criteria.description: Complete Essay "COB_PersonalStatement/Career GOALS"   or Complete Essay "GEN_Personal_Statement "   or Complete Essay "ADV_Personal_Statement"   or Complete Essay "ADV_Gage_Community"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Essay "COB_PersonalStatement/Career GOALS"   or Complete Essay "GEN_Personal_Statement "   or Complete Essay "ADV_Personal_Statement"   or Complete Essay "ADV_Gage_Community"

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration
